divs: Sighting Details I was driving northbound on I-25 and around 5-6 pm, when I saw a triangle of three red lights, two of which were blinking, above the freeway seeming to be moving east to west. It was absolutely silent. There were no other identifying markers lights or patterns like a helicopter or any other type of aircraft Ive ever seen, and I work near the Sun port. At first I didnt believe what I was seeing, but I kept my eye on it as best I could whiole driving on the freeway at 70. I lost sight of it as i followed the freeway into a gentle left turn. Ive checked with a pilot friend of mine and he says it doesnt sound like anything hes ever seen, and hes flown just about everything with wings. If anyone else in Albuquerque saw that thing, early evening on January 12 th, please hit me back. OH yeah, KOAT Channel 7 news, reported people saw a a meteor in their 10pm broadcast, HAH. Meteors dont have blinking lights on them...Ive SEEN meteors! Today, January 17th, I saw on you tube, that someone had videoed the object, same day same time.
Summary: three red lights, 2 blinking, one steady never blinking.
trends: There have been 129 other sightings in Albuquerque
There were no other sightings in Albuquerque on or around January 12th 2012
